title: Rally your classmates for the next uni tournament!

replies.body:
Do you have to be at uni to enter or can anyone enter?  and can you enter as a single player and get given a team
?

Hey man,

You need to be a team all from the same university to register.

If you're looking for players to form a team I highly suggest getting out to Uni and asking around (maybe your uni has a LoL club!) or heading on over to this subboard and list some details (uni, position, serious or not etc)

http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/oceanic-university-championship

Ok thanks for that, I have another question that i would love you to answer. My friends and i were looking to join the tournament but we dont go to uni... is it okay if were all from the same college?

You need to be a university student to participate in this tournament sorry!
But I know a community group run high school competitions - https://www.facebook.com/OCESSLoLT
What about New Caledonia? :( A lot of Caledonians play League of Legends and nothing for us?

Hey Aerie,

If you check out the rules and regions you will find that teams from the University of New Caledonia should register under the NZ region. So you guys can definitely take compete and represent your university!

http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/oceanic-university-championship/AfvUsYQ3-ouc-faq-and-rules
Aww that's exciting, thank you forpointing that out :) I'm so excited, I am SO telling my friends :D
Do it, would love to see a team representing New Caledonia and also your university!
If one of our regular team members is currently taking a gap year from the university the rest of the team is enrolled at, can he still participate or do we need to find a replacement for him?

Hey CPX,

Unfortunately they will need to be currently enrolled to participate.
Soo, just curious is the OPL group going to be casting this or are you going to get a bunch of new casters. If so, where do I send my application :3

Hey buddy I may not be Maraudaur but I am part of the broadcast team. We do already have all of our casters lined up for the majority of the tournament. I believe once we get to the grand finals though the OPL team does indeed take over.

> [{quoted}](name=Smite,realm=OCE,application-id=pEj6Ee6n,discussion-id=dPZ7EjeN,comment-id=000b0000,timestamp=2015-07-24T01:22:02.036+0000)
>
> Hey buddy I may not be Maraudaur but I am part of the broadcast team. We do already have all of our casters lined up for the majority of the tournament. I believe once we get to the grand finals though the OPL team does indeed take over.

Thanks man, trying to get a bit more presence as a caster so It sucks that all the spots are filled. But good luck with the stream :D
If you have any questions feel free to ask here
If i am a single player can i join a team or join as a solo player? or do i need a whole team to join/play?

You will need a full team to join, but if you're looking for players head on over to the boards and maybe list your details - http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/oceanic-university-championship
Hi was wondering, how many teams can enter from a single university?
I was just like "Oh yay, I can enter this!" and then "Oh no, I have work on qualifier day :("
What about a high school or is that not allowed?

Hey! I'm just gonna jump in here.

This comp is only for university teams, but there is a community group that runs a tournament for highschool teams - https://www.facebook.com/OCESSLoLT

We're currently in the middle of a tournament at the moment but check us out, we have feature games every week that we stream, and keep an eye out on our page for updates on the next tournament :)
I'd love doing something like this, unfortunately i'm not in uni. :({{item:3070}}
If a team reaches the grandfinal, will all of its members be flown to Syndey? (Ie. A team with 5 starting players that also has a coach and a sub, will they be flown out as well?)

Hey,

Unfortunately we will only be flying out the starting 5 players.
Why are you doing this midsemester? :( :( :(
Rats, so we cant have a team with 5 players from 5 uni's..
Uni break hasn't occurred yet... and won't for another 6 weeks?
Does transition course count as Uni?

> [{quoted}](name=Blue Lantern Gal,realm=OCE,application-id=pEj6Ee6n,discussion-id=dPZ7EjeN,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2015-07-21T05:09:35.290+0000)
>
> Does transition course count as Uni?

nope, transition is a tafe course.
Tafe counts as long as you are signed up through a university on the list
Check out the rules - http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/oceanic-university-championship/AfvUsYQ3-ouc-faq-and-rules
What if i we go to Weltec/PolyTech or i think in Aussie its Tafe

They should be fine as long as all 5 players are from the same Institute. For a full list of eligible institutions check out the rules - http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/oceanic-university-championship/AfvUsYQ3-ouc-faq-and-rules
Does it have to be Uni or can it be Schools as well?

There is a full list of institutions in the rules.

http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/oceanic-university-championship/AfvUsYQ3-ouc-faq-and-rules
What about New Caledonia can we sign in for the Oceanic University Championship ?
Hey I answered this question below in Aerie's question

Hey, I know this question doesn't follow the guidelines to participate nor does it meet the criteria but I'm a part of a team and we would love to compete in this tournament, however, we're currently stationed at Indonesia, Jakarta and our school is called Sinarmas World Academy which is an international school. Yes, it's a school and not a university :( I'm currently in my last year of school and my teammates are 2 years below ... so this is a longshot but is there any other way we can compete in this tournament? _Or can you guys make another tournament that involves high schools please ... ? I'm an Australian born ... if that helps ......

Thanks Rito

You need to be a university student to participate in this tournament sorry!
But I know a community group run high school competitions - https://www.facebook.com/OCESSLoLT
Oh no :( They already started their splits

For all UOW students, swing by here
https://www.facebook.com/groups/LoLVGA/
Can highschoolers enroll , and only accept the keyboards (people just scared well win)

You need to be a university student to participate in this tournament sorry!
But I know a community group run high school competitions - https://www.facebook.com/OCESSLoLT
If you are in University of Melbourne, add Leeyeats

Do you have to be in University, or can you be in middle school/Highschool?
Plz Reply :D.

I have a group, Just i'm not in Uni/They arent either. I think xD

You need to be a university student to participate in this tournament sorry!

But I know a community group run high school competitions - https://www.facebook.com/OCESSLoLT
do you have to be maxed lvl
You do not need to be max level, you just need to have a full team of 5 from the same university.
so lets say i live in north america and my friends lives in new zealand will i still be able to do it?
You need to be studying in a University in the Oceanic Region and your team need to attend the same university
will there be a 10-11 one and if there is how do i join :D
